definition.name: Label
definition.description: A form label component built on top of Radix UI's Label primitive. It provides consistent styling and accessibility features for form labels. The component supports custom className props for additional styling flexibility and automatically handles disabled states of associated form controls.

properties.description: Accepts all standard HTML label attributes plus custom className for styling

className.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the label

interactions: Can be clicked to focus the associated form control
Visually indicates when associated form control is disabled
definition.visualLayout: Renders as an inline text element with consistent typography styling (text-sm, font-medium, leading-none). Includes special styling for when the associated form control is disabled (cursor-not-allowed and reduced opacity).
definition.implementationNotes: Built using Radix UI's Label primitive and class-variance-authority for style variants. Uses React.forwardRef to properly handle ref forwarding.
